category.description: Treasured by anglers from Alaska to the equator, Blue Fox® lures offer premium quality spinners, spoons and accessories designed for specific techniques and conditions. category.description: The legendary Vibrax® Spinner has laid a foundation for a vast collection of spinners from Blue Fox for today’s angling styles. Whether casting for smallies or working fast moving rivers for salmon and trout there is a Blue Fox spinner built for your fishing conditions. Premium components complimented by super sharp VMC® hooks result in unsurpassed fishing experiences.

category.description: Vibrax exceeds all others in quality, durability and its ability to consistently catch fish. Legendary Blue Fox quality is apparent in the flaw-free plating, fine tolerances, super sharp hooks and “life-like” dressings.

category.description: How do you improve upon the legendary Classic Vibrax spinner? Add a tail, of course. The Classic Vibrax Foxtail ups the attraction factor with a feather tail dressing.

category.description: When the fish are saying “no”, try adding some glow. Blue Fox Classic Vibrax Glow spinners brighten up the proven Vibrax formula for a killer combination. category.description: The 30° deep depth blade of the Blue Fox Flash Spinner runs 4-5 feet. This lure is designed to go deep and to flicker and flash on the fall and retrieve, thanks to a laser holographic blade and body finish.

category.description: The Blue Fox Minnow Spin mimics one of the most prolific baitfish. It has a tight minnow action combined with an inline spinner flash that drives fish wild. A very effective combination for putting lots of fish in the boat.

page-attributes.page-description: The Blue Fox Minnow Spin mimics one of the most prolific baitfish. It has a tight minnow action combined with an inline spinner flash that drives fish wild. A very effective combination for putting lots of fish in the boat.

category.description: The Super Bou is a super-sized double bladed spinnerbait for the serious fisherman. Marabou, flashabou, and twin Colorado blades all combine to create major action, vibration and flash. Big fish go after big bait, and the Super Bou is sure to attract a trophy catch.

category.description: Take the legendary, fish-catching vibration of the Classic Vibrax to the fast, deep water with the Vibrax Bullet and Bullet Fly spinnerbaits. page-attributes.page-description: Take the legendary, fish-catching vibration of the Classic Vibrax to the fast, deep water with the Vibrax Bullet and Bullet Fly spinnerbaits. category.description: From the legendary names to the finest modern designs you'll not only find the most productive lures of their kind, you'll find the lures that have defined techniques for decades. And while these perennial favorites continue to fill fish boxes, we haven't rested on our landing nets. The latest technologies offer better balance, more action and deeper dives, while making these performance features easier than ever for novice anglers to enjoy.

category.description: Tie on a Luhr-Jensen hard bait and you’re engaging the experience of generations of craftsmen with a deep understanding of the predator-prey relationship and how to motivate fish to strike. These crankbaits have precisely tuned swimming actions for a productivity you’ve never experienced before. A vast array of colors, including new UV Bright finishes, enables you to find the perfect match for the conditions.

category.description: Spinners trigger the instinctual response of predators to take advantage of an easy meal. The broad selection of Luhr-Jensen spinner designs deliver this response from fish throughout all water types, fishing techniques, and fish species. Premium materials and components provide a quality base for each and every design. When that fish of a lifetime strikes, you'll be properly prepared.

category.description: Lures that are universally appealing to game fish the world over, Luhr-Jensen Spoons offer anglers the choice from weighted casting and jigging models, to thin-blade trolling spoons that mimic available baitfish or capture attention with attractor patterns under all conditions. Whether nickel, silver, genuine gold plate or painted, a Luhr-Jensen finish will continue to produce fish after fish after fish, trouble free.

category.description: Trolling is the single most productive method for catching fish. With proper execution, you'll cover more water, both vertically and horizontally, than any other technique. Legendary in the waters of the Northwest and the Great Lakes Luhr-Jensen trolling gear is unrivaled. Whether fishing lake trolls, with flash and vibration to attract predatory fish from a distance, Dodgers and Flashers to attract fish while also imparting additional action to trailing lures or baits or using Luhr-Jensen trolling divers to capture the pressure created by the forward momentum of a trolling boat and utilize it to achieve the target depth. All provide unique characteristics that make them the most effective products available for the applications they're designed for.

All provide unique characteristics that make them the most effective products available for the applications they're designed for.

category.description: TOUGHER. STRONGER. SMARTER. It’s a big decision when you’re buying an ice shelter. Not a hard one though. You should know by now that you get what you pay for. No cutting corners. No wannabe, lookalike knockoffs. You want the real deal. The one you know is gonna do what it says it will and then surprise you with the smart details you get to discover. That’s where we come from at Otter.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter

category.description:
TOUGHER. STRONGER. SMARTER.

No wannabe, lookalike knockoffs. Start with the legendary Otter Pro Sled ... roto-molded and designed specifically for ice fishing. Then add the strongest aluminum frame available. Top it off with the elite, redesigned Pro XT1200 Full Thermal Shell or the XT650 Thermal Top Dual Layer Shell, the most durable on the market.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter ice fishing shelters are the toughest on the market and the choice of seasoned ice vets. Offering the Pro XT1200 fully insulated shelter and the thermal top XT650.

category.description: Otter’s XT650 thermal-top shelter packages combine a dual-layer thermal top with features to manhandle rugged ice. Built on the legendary, roto-molded sled, the XT650 is the toughest fish house on the market. Tow this Otter across the harshest parts of the ice belt and stay warm the whole day of fishing.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s XT650 thermal-top ice fishing shelters combine a dual-layer thermal top with features to manhandle rugged ice.

category.description: Designed with input from hardcore ice heads, the Pro XT1200 is the ice shelter for fanatical anglers who demand it all. A fish house is only as good as its sled, and this one is built upon the legendary Otter Pro Sled. Add to that unmatchable warmth, durability and a slew of smart features and you’ve got the best shelters available today.

page-attributes.page-description: Designed with input from hardcore ice heads, the Pro XT1200 is the ice shelter for fanatical anglers who demand it all.

category.description: Custom made to fit Otter sleds and shelters, these seats and accessories make a good day fishing great. From house patches to rod holders, Otter-made gear is tough. And it’s made by ice anglers, so you know it’ll be just what you need and will work right the first time you use it.

page-attributes.page-description: Custom made to fit Otter sleds and shelters, Otter seats and other ice fishing shelter accessories make a good day fishing great.

category.description: When the winds are gale-force, even the toughest fish houses need a little extra support. For additional bracing during extreme weather, turn to Otter’s Adjustable Front Wind Pole to settle things down.

page-attributes.page-description: For additional bracing during extreme weather, turn to Otter’s Adjustable Front Wind Pole to settle things down.

category.description: It’s already cold enough out there. Ice fish in comfort by adding an Otter Cross-Linked Seat Rail to your Pro Sled. With the Cross-Linked Seat Rail, you can upgrade to a super comfortable Cushioned Seat and feel good all day long.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s Cross-Linked Seat Rail allows you to upgrade to a cushioned seat and acts as a stabilizer to add additional rigidity while towing.

custom-attributes.custom-attribute: Cross-Linked Seat Rail with Mounting Hardware

category.description: Even the legendary toughness of Otter ice fishing shelters is no match for Father Time. Years of wind and ice or pesky mice can lead to a hole or two. So can a clumsy angler with an auger or a fillet knife. There’s no need to get a new fish house—simply affix a patch and get years more service from your Otter.

page-attributes.page-description: Repair holes from wear or mice to your ice fishing shelter’s shell with Otter’s fish house patches. Available in large and small.

category.description: Enjoy hands-free fishing without fear of losing your rod down the hole with Otter’s Rod holder. The pivoting design allows you to position your rod perfectly and securely over the hole. Rod can be quickly removed when a fish is on the line.

page-attributes.page-description: The Otter Rod Holder is made of powder coated steel and mounts in Otter shelters and most portables. Comes with a 1 year warranty.

category.description: Sure, you can sit on a 6-gallon bucket, but why suffer? Upgrade to an Otter seat or bench and ice fish in total comfort. No more aching back or numb rear end. No more tingling legs and feet that have fallen asleep. Sit in an Otter seat and you’ll be able focus on fishing rather than fidgeting.

page-attributes.page-description: Upgrade to an Otter seat or bench and ice fish in total comfort. Feature thick cushioning and folding backrests. Bench flips up to access gear below.

category.description: In tight quarters, organization is key. A place for everything and everything in its place. Keep crucial items close at hand with Otter’s Sportsman’s Caddy Center Console. Designed to fit on the Cross-Link Rail, the Sportsman’s Caddy can be placed right next to your seat for easy access to lures, tools, drinks and more.

page-attributes.page-description: Keep crucial items close at hand in your ice shelter with Otter’s Sportsman’s Caddy Center Console.

category.description: Inclement weather and rugged terrain can do a number on the gear you’re hauling on the ice. Keep everything in your Otter sled safe and secure with the XT Series House Travel Cover.

page-attributes.page-description: Keep everything in your Otter sled safe and secure with the XT Series House Travel Cover.

category.description: Every legendary Otter sled is roto-molded tough. Like the first mold made in our owner’s garage almost two decades ago, each sled is made by hand. A solid aluminum core and 100% polyethylene coating holds up in extreme temperatures and stays flexible. Roto molding ensures a uniform thickness with no weak spots—outside corners and bottom edges that take the most beating are as strong as the rest of the sled. The best materials and the best processes make Otter the best built sled on the market.

page-attributes.page-description: The best materials and the best processes make Otter the best built ice fishing sled on the market. Choose from Pro Sled, Sport Sled and Medium Wild Sled.

category.description: Otter Pro Sleds are 100% roto-molded tough. That means they’re made to withstand the extreme conditions that ice fishing is known for. They’re made for sub-zero temps, rough ice, snow and slush. They’re made to fit all your gear and be hand-pulled or towed without any chance of breaking under the stress.

page-attributes.page-description: Pro Otter Pro Sleds are 100% roto-molded tough and specifically made to withstand the extreme conditions that ice fishing is known for.

category.description: Get everything you need in one shot with Otter’s Medium Sled Combo. Perfect for early season ice or working smaller lakes and bays, the Sled Combo includes the Medium Wild Sled, Hitch, Hyfax Runner Kit and Sled cover. Pack it up, hook it up to your vehicle and hit the ice.

page-attributes.page-description: Perfect for early season ice or smaller lakes and bays, the Otter Medium Sled Combo includes the Medium Wild Sled, Hitch, Hyfax Runner Kit and Sled cover.

category.description: Our Sport Sleds are a lighter weight version of the Pro Sled, but are still as tough as nails. Each Sport Sled is roto-molded, just like all Otters, for uniform thickness and strength throughout. Despite its superior sturdiness, the largest size tops out at just 17 pounds, making this sled the best choice for hand-pulling.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter Sport Sleds are a lighter weight version of the Pro Sled, but are still as tough as nails.

category.description: Built to Otter’s demanding standards, these sled accessories are constructed from on-the-ice experience with the details that makes sense the first time you use them. Each one makes your time on the ice easier and more convenient— you’ll wonder how you ever did without them!

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s ice fishing sled accessories are constructed from on-the-ice experience with the details that make sense the first time you use them.

category.description: Hook up your sled for towing and get out on the ice faster with Otter’s Flipper Hitch Adapter. Both smart and simple, this little device makes attaching a tow hitch to your vehicle a breeze.

page-attributes.page-description: Hook up your sled for towing and get out on the ice faster with Otter’s Flipper Hitch Adapter.

category.description: Connecting and disconnecting your hitch from your sled can be tiresome and difficult, especially in the freezing cold. With Otter’s Hitch Pivot, you’ll never need to remove the hitch from your sled again. Go from pickup truck, to snowmobile and back to the pickup truck without ever struggling to reach under the bow of the sled to pull out the hitch pins.

page-attributes.page-description: With Otter’s Hitch Pivot, you’ll never need to remove the hitch from your sled again.

category.description: If you have more gear than can fit into one sled, Otter’s Rear Sled Hitch Receiver with Pin is a must for you. This is the first factory approved hitching system that allows you to tow two sleds in tandem, one directly in line behind the other.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s Rear Sled Hitch Receiver with Pin allows you to tow two sleds in tandem, one directly in line behind the other.

category.description: Extend the life of your Otter sled with the Hyfax Runner Kit. If you put a lot of miles on your Otter ice fishing sled or pull it over extremely rugged terrain, the Hyfax Runners will take the abuse of all that dragging instead of the bottom of the sled, saving a lot of wear and tear

page-attributes.page-description: Extend the life of your Otter sled with the Hyfax Runner Kit. Available in several sizes to fit all Otter models.

category.description: Get your Otter sled to your fishing spot with ease with the Otter Tow Hitch. Like all Otter products, the Tow Hitch is the strongest available on the market. It’s also the smartest. With a pivoting, spring-loaded coupler that absorbs shock, you can rip up and down the lake and this tow hitch will ensure a smooth ride for the sled and all the gear inside it.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s tow hitch is absolutely the strongest on the market. Shock absorbing coupler ensures a smooth ride.

category.description: When you’re cruising at 40 MPH on the lake, you don’t want to have to worry about losing gear overboard or mucking everything up with mud and slush. Keep everything in place and protected from the elements with Otter’s Sled Travel Covers.

page-attributes.page-description: Keep gear in place and protected from the elements with Otter’s ice fishing Sled Travel Covers.

category.description: The day of fishing is done and you’re packing up to head back home. It’s freezing, your fingers are numb and as you try to hook up the sled tow hitch, the pin drops into the snow, never to be found again. Been there before? Get your replacement Tow Hitch Pins here. And while you’re at it, get a spare set for the next time a pin goes missing.

page-attributes.page-description: Get your Otter Sled Tow Hitch Pins here. Universal Tow Hitch Pin to connect to ORV, ATV and snowmobile also available.

category.description: Go from hand-pulling to towing by vehicle in a snap with Otter’s Universal Tow Hitch Adapter. This adapter allows the Otter Sled Tow Hitch to attach to the Otter Pro Mini Sled. Haul more gear on the ice and then hook it up to the tractor for yard work in the off-season.

page-attributes.page-description: Go from hand-pulling to towing by vehicle in a snap with Otter’s Universal Tow Hitch Adapter.

category.description: Otter sleds and shelters are known for being the toughest available on the market. Our accessories are made the same way. 100% rugged roto-molded polyethylene, made in Minnesota by ice fishermen, for ice fishermen.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter ice fishing accessories are 100% rugged roto-molded polyethylene, made in Minnesota by ice fisherman, for ice fisherman.

category.description: Ice augers are great at punching holes in the ice, and sometimes in your gear too. When you’re speeding across the ice in below zero conditions and your unprotected auger is bouncing around in the sled, things get ruined. Keep your gear and your ice auger safe with an Otter Auger shield.

page-attributes.page-description: Keep your gear and your ice auger safe with an Otter Auger shield. Made of roto-molded polyethylene for unbeatable toughness.

category.description: It’s ice out and time to stow away the ice fishing gear. There’s enough clutter in any given garage or shed to start with – no need to add a large (and sharp) auger to the mix. When it’s time to stow the ice fishing gear, keep your ice auger protected and out of harm’s way with our Auger Shield Mount.

page-attributes.page-description: Keep your ice auger protected and out of harm’s way with Otter’s Auger Shield Mount.

category.description: There’s nothing worse than breaking a rod in transport. Don’t take any chances—keep your rods protected with Otter’s Sportsman’s Rod Case.

page-attributes.page-description: Otter’s Sportsman’s Rod Case is 100% rugged roto-molded polyethylene. Indestructible, lightweight, and big enough to protect up to 6 rod combos.

category.description: Rapala® has been the world's favorite fishing lure since 1936. Today, Rapala lures, knives, tools and accessories are trusted by fishermen in over 140 countries worldwide. Rapala's reputation stems from a towering list of world record catches, the knowledge of our Pro Anglers and a history of unwavering dedication to quality. Each and every Rapala lure is still hand-tuned and tank-tested to assure it has the Rapala trademark swimming action that big fish can't resist.
Rapala

category.description: With meticulous precision, every fishing lure made by Rapala swims with perfection right out of the box. Lauri Rapala, our founder, demanded it. Since 1936, each and every lure made lives up to this promise. Hand-tuned and tank-tested, anglers the world over count on Rapala® lures for consistent success. This unwavering dedication to quality is the reason why Rapala makes 20 million lures a year, sold in over 140 countries around the world. And it’s the reason why more world record fish have been caught on a Rapala than any other brand. Simply put, Rapala fishing lures make better fishermen!

category.description: The BX series of lures from Rapala combine the lively, responsive action our balsa lures offer, with the option to fish them in the most extreme, rugged conditions. Balsa on the inside, each is encased with a durable copolymer shell for unbeatable toughness. As a bonus, this construction allows for the most incredible, life-like finishes, unlike anything seen before. These lures can stand up to bites all day from large, toothy fish.

category.description: The legendary Rapala Countdown® lure was introduced back in the 60s and is still included among the favorites of professional and casual anglers alike. The gravity defying body of the Countdown sinks, at a foot per second, to your desired depth allowing you to repeatedly reach and retrieve without rising out of the strike zone. With this lure, you can find fish quickly and consistently throughout the water column, whether they’re at the weed tops or holding bottom.

page-attributes.page-description: The legendary Rapala Countdown® lure was introduced back in the 60s and is still included among the favorites of professional and casual anglers alike. category.description: The DT® (Dives-To) series, introduced in 2003, was designed to dive faster and stay in the strike zone longer than any other crankbait on the market. A claim we can still make today. Made from the top 7% of select balsa, this perfectly consistent wood is crafted into a tapered fuselage then precisely fitted with internal weights and matched with a custom lip. DT series lures come in a variety of profiles and swimming depths, allowing anglers to target any area from shallow to deep. These lures dive quickly to a preset depth and stay in the strike zone for the entire retrieve.

category.description: Declare your allegiance to the world’s favorite lure in a really big way! Rapala’s Giant Lures won’t catch you a fish, but they will catch the fancy of anyone who sees them decorating your space. These larger than life replicas are a great conversation piece for a bar, fishing cabin, rec room, man cave or office.

category.description: Rapala’s Husky Jerk® series boasts some of the most universal fish-catching lures ever designed. The finely tuned balance of these lures mean that they can be cast or trolled at any speed and run true. The beauty of the Husky Jerk is that it works so well in so many situations—off sunken islands or rock points, whether fish are holding deep or up on a shallow shelf, or in warm or cold water. The angler controls the speed and action of the bait depending on the target species and situation, and the Husky Jerk does the rest.

Ike’s Custom Ink Lures are masterpieces in their own right, based on his experience with experimenting and “tweaking” his lures.

category.description: When you’re stalking suspended game fish under the ice or in open water, the lure you want on the end of your line is one from Rapala’s Jigging Rap series. The Jigging Rap lures have a pronounced movement on both the rise and fall, with a strike triggering, slow circle down action. Long known for its ice fishing prowess, the Jigging Rap series is also becoming a staple in open water too.

category.description: Rapala’s Magnum lures are regarded by many anglers as the best big fish lures worldwide. In fact, IGFA records confirm that these are the world's number one saltwater hard bodied lure. Built to take the abuse of hard hitting fish like blues, tarpon, tuna and wahoo, Rapala Magnum lures are rigged saltwater tough. VMC Perma Steel hooks can stand up to heavy strikes and tough jaws all day and all hardware is rugged and corrosion resistant for premium performance.

page-attributes.page-description: Rapala’s Magnum lures are regarded by many anglers as the best big fish lures worldwide. Built to take the abuse of hard hitting fish like blues, tarpon, tuna and wahoo, Rapala Magnum lures are rigged saltwater tough. category.description: The "Original Finnish Minnow" is still the number one "go-to" lure. Whether twitched on the top as a surface bait, retrieved as a shallow runner, weighted with a split shot for medium depths or bottom walked off a three-way swivel or bottom-bounce, the wounded minnow action continues to be irresistible to gamefish.

page-attributes.page-description: The Rapala Original Floating® lure is the one that started it all and is still the number one “go-to” lure for anglers worldwide. Like all the lures that came after it, the Original Floating lure is hand tuned and tank tested to ensure that it swims the same as the very first right out of the box. It’s reliable, versatile, effective and best of all, irresistible to game fish.

category.description: The Rippin' Rap features a lipless, deep belly profile designed to crank, swim and rip. Its tall and skinny body design creates an irresistible flutter on the drop and hard vibrating action on fast or slow retrieves. Textured scales and gills with deep set 3D holographic eyes are accented by a loud, distinctive BB rattle system that will be turning fish heads on every cast.

page-attributes.page-description: The Rippin' Rap features a lipless, deep belly profile designed to crank, swim and rip. With its skinny sides this bait flutters on the drop. Hard vibrating action on fast or slow retrieves accented with loud, distinctive BB rattle system. Textured scales and gills with deep set 3D holographic eyes. Super easy to fish, the Rippin’ Rap® is perfect for pulling over or through grass, bouncing off timber and rippin’ through rocks. Long-casting with variable running depth, this one is just right for clear water where look is key or for fishing stained, dark water where just the right sound is essential. Fast piercing VMC® black nickel hooks seal the deal.

The RipStop™ tail design creates a fast-ripping, flashing swimbait action. Hard-stopping, forward motion stops on a dime, with a subtle shimmy before coming to a rest, then ever so slightly lifts its head with a super slow-rise. Cast & wind, wind & stop, twitch, snap, rip and suspend, fish it your favorite way for all species of gamefish.

category.description: When Rapala’s Scatter Rap® series was introduced in 2013, the fishing world fell for it hook, line and sinker. Its signature aggressive, evasive, erratic action perfectly mimics a spooked bait fish fleeing for its life. Big fish can’t resist it and anglers are calling it a bass-fishing revolution.

page-attributes.page-description: When Rapala’s Scatter Rap® series was introduced in 2013, the fishing world fell for it hook, line and sinker. category.description: The success of Rapala’s Shad Rap® series lies in the simple fact that it mimics the most prolific baitfish found in streams, lakes and rivers around the world far better than any other. The shape, true-to-life colors and classic Rapala action make the Shad Rap a fish-catching machine and a staple in every serious angler’s arsenal.

page-attributes.page-description: The success of Rapala’s Shad Rap® series lies in the simple fact that it mimics the most prolific baitfish found in streams, lakes and rivers around the world far better than any other. category.description: Rapala’s Shadow Rap® series, your new favorite jerkbaits. These lures have moves that other lures only dream about. A horizontal struggle with a big kick, plus a vertical fade or a vertical rise on the pause perfectly mimics a minnow or a shad in its last, quivering moments before the end. The kick, the snap back to life and the slow fading or rising all trigger fish to hit the Shadow Raps, and hit them hard.

page-attributes.page-description: Rapala’s Shadow Rap® series, your new favorite jerkbaits. These lures have moves that other lures only dream about. category.description: Rapala’s Skitter Walk® series of lures is topwater perfection. The Skitter Walk has a side-to-side action that mimics a swimming mullet or fleeing baitfish. Toss it out. Pump. Reel. Pump. Reel. Pump, you’re “Walking-the-Dog”. A weighted tail keeps the bait in natural position even at rest. The large internal rattle creates a rhythmic motion and sound combination that draw explosive surface strikes. Hang on!

page-attributes.page-description: Rapala’s Skitter Walk® series of lures is topwater perfection. The Skitter Walk has a side-to-side action that mimics a swimming mullet or fleeing baitfish. Toss it out. Pump. Reel. Pump. Reel. Pump, you’re “Walking-the-Dog”. A weighted tail keeps the bait in natural position even at rest. The large internal rattle creates a rhythmic motion and sound combination that draw explosive surface strikes. Hang on!

category.description: The Rapala Tail Dancer lures have a banana-style balsa wood body that creates a deadly "wide-tail" wobble, without sacrificing that classic Rapala action. Features a large lip, tapered tail and an internal rattle mechanism to entice even the pickiest of fish. Originally developed as a walleye bait, the Tail Dancer has proved effective for bass, trout and salmon fisheries as well. The hard working, wide-tail wobble is apparent at slow speeds and equally potent when trolled fast.

page-attributes.page-description: The Rapala Tail Dancer lures have a banana-style balsa wood body that creates a deadly "wide-tail" wobble, without sacrificing that classic Rapala action. category.description: Rapala’s Ultra Light series of lures offer big action in a small bait. What they lack in size, they make up for in fishability. These lures are weighted for super long casts—as far as baits 2-3 times its size—with a wobbling and rolling swimming action that drive fish crazy. The Ultra Light series is slow-sinking on the pause and is designed to work anywhere from 2-8 feet in the water column. An excellent choice for streams, small ponds and shallow bays and shorelines.

page-attributes.page-description: Rapala’s Ultra Light series of lures offer big action in a small bait. What they lack in size, they make up for in fishability. category.description: In the not too distant past, there was a time without X-Raps. No #10. No Slashbait® action. Then it happened. The introduction of the original X-Rap®. And soon afer a family of choes spawned by demand. The same way the Original Floating® had a profound influence on techniques and styling of fishing, the X-Rap revolutionized jerkbaits, and today influence the way anglers catch fish around the world, with success in both fresh and saltwater fisheries.

page-attributes.page-description: Rapala’s X-Rap® series lures are the ultimate in versatility. Years of development led to a lure that can be fished any season, anywhere, for any fish. Its unique technology allows the angler to change the swimming action simply by speeding up or slowing down the retrieve. Fish it aggressively for the hard cutting, side-to-side Slashbait® action or slow it down for the classic Rapala roll.

category.description: These lures changed the way anglers fish. Rapala’s X-Rap® Saltwater series lures are extremely versitile and effective. Built and colored specifically for salt water use, these lures will withstand a plethora of even the most agressive salt water beasts. Expert design and exclusive X-Rap technology give the angler complete control and allow the swimming action to be changed by simply changing the speed of the retrieve. With multiple lure designs and long casting design X-Rap Saltwater lures can be fished shallow or deep with a variety of different techniques.

page-attributes.page-description: X-Rap Saltwater Series

category.description: Big fish eat little fish, especially little fish that are wounded. Rapala lures perfectly mimic that wounded baitfish “wobble”. It’s an action as distinct to Rapala as a fingerprint is to a person. An action no other company has been able to duplicate. To this day, each lure is hand-tuned and tank-tested to ensure it swims perfectly, right out of the box.

If you’ve had a good day on the water and have a haul to fillet, the comfortable, relaxed grip will keep hands fatigue-free.

category.description: Spring bass. The two words together are almost magical to a bass angler. It’s been months since you’ve thrown a lure and months since the fish have seen one. Spring is the time when the bass move from the depths to shallower water as they prepare for spawn. It’s when they start to school up and feed heavily. It’s the time when you can catch a lot of bass—a lot of big bass.

page-attributes.page-description: Spring bass. The two words together are almost magical to a bass angler. It’s been months since you’ve thrown a lure and months since the fish have seen one. Spring is the time when the bass move from the depths to shallower water as they prepare for spawn. It’s when they start to school up and feed heavily. It’s the time when you can catch a lot of bass—a lot of big bass.

category.description: Think summer bass fishing is difficult? Guess again. Fishing pros made a list of their favorite products to get big bass on the line in the heat of summer. You can rest easy knowing that any of these picks will have you reeling in bass day in and day out. Find a new favorite or stock up on your secret weapon, these products won't leave you with an empty stringer.

page-attributes.page-description: Every bass angler has this specific summer bass fishing memory: a hazy summer morning, floating on mirror-smooth water with nothing but the sound of the lure plunking into the water. Suddenly, you feel the weight on the line, you set the hook and feel your heart race and sweat drip as you reel in your first lunker of the day. Summer can be a tough time to bass fish, but nothing beats catching bass with just a t-shirt, a rod and a little sweat on your brow.

category.description: After the doldrums of summer, the action that fall bass fishing promises is irresistible to anglers. Bass are schooling and feeding heavily in preparation for the winter, so it’s possible to catch dozens of fish in a day. You read that right – dozens, or more in just one day.

page-attributes.page-description: After the doldrums of summer, the action that fall bass fishing promises is irresistible to anglers. category.description: Ouch! Though winter fishing may be cold, these picks are hot. Check out key products from pro tackleboxes all in one place. Nothing beats a crisp winter day of reeling up slabs one after another. With these pro picks you'll have to restrain yourself from catching every fish in the area.

page-attributes.page-description: When the mercury starts dropping, it doesn’t mean you have to put away your bass rod. Cold water bass fishing can reap great results since the fish are looking for a few last good meals before winter fully sets in. With a little know-how, you can catch bass at the front end of the season, or even mid-winter after a few warm days or a warm front of rain.
page-attributes.page-keywords: bass fishing in winter, cold water bass fishing

category.description: Not much gets the adrenaline going like hooking into a hard-fighting muskie or pike. These fish give anglers a heart-thumping good time with intense runs and acrobatics. And then of course there are the legends of the ever-elusive “big one”. Visions of hauling in a 60-pound pike keep anglers flocking to the water, searching the depths for the giant. Record size or not, landing pike or muskie is pure fishing joy.

category.description: Most anglers begin their love affair with fishing catching panfish as kids at the local pond or stream. Panfish are not picky eaters and will bite on a variety of lures and presentations, which makes them a heck of a lot of fun to fish for.

category.description: Rapala’s Husky Jerk® series boasts some of the most universal fish-catching lures ever designed. The finely tuned balance of these lures mean that they can be cast or trolled at any speed and run true. The beauty of the Husky Jerk is that it works so well in so many situations—off sunken islands or rock points, whether fish are holding deep or up on a shallow shelf, or in warm or cold water. The angler controls the speed and action of the bait depending on the target species and situation, and the Husky Jerk does the rest.

category.description: Single or tandem, Dacron or steel, Williamson Assist Hooks increase your catch percentage from the moment you put them on your favorite jigs. Because the assist hooks hang freely and are lighter than the jig, they often get sucked into the fish’s mouth before it gets to the jig—hooking the fish before it even knows it. Be sure to rig these directly to the leader so fish can’t use the weight of the lure to throw the hook.

category.description: Storm’s Arashi® Series boasts a technology trifecta that sets these crankbaits apart from the rest. Technological edge #1: the circuit board lip that starts right away at slow speeds and quickly reaches maximum diving depth. The lip is extremely thin, with superior strength and durability. Technological edge #2: Rotated hook hangers nest the hook close to the body for improved action, preventing hang-ups and allowing larger hooks. And the final component of the trifecta: our patent-pending self-tuning line tie. This is a free moving design that keeps the lure tracking true, ensuring non-stop fishing action.

JIG HEAD Whether resting on the bottom, using a lift drop technique or slowly swimming, the jig with 60 degree line tie is a versatile choice. Features a large holographic eye, tight-grip bait keeper, and heavy-duty VMC® Coastal Black® hook. WEIGHTED SWIMBAIT HOOK The choice for weedless presentations and when a slower retrieve speed or slower horizontal fall is required. Features a tapered screw bait keeper for easy rigging, balanced keel weight and heavy-duty VMC® Coastal Black® hook.

category.description: After you’ve used Sufix Tip-Up ice fishing line, you’ll never use another brand again. An array of proven fish-catching colors and the enhanced Ultra Glow pigments give the angler every advantage to put more fish in the well. Also available pre-rigged on the VMC® Tungsten Luv Bug Jig.

category.description: TriggerX Minnows are irresistible to schools of hungry panfish that are feeding on minnow fry. If you’re ready for unmatched performance with a soft bait, you’re ready for TriggerX Minnows.

category.description: The TriggerX Nymph is a perfect replica of the small insects and crustaceans that fish feed on all year round. Bump it on the bottom to stir up a following, or twitch it over open water to simulate the fleeing action of a big ‘old bug. Whichever way you fish it, the larger profile of the TriggerX Nymph will land you some bull bluegills and slab crappies.

category.description: VMC’s Flash Champ Spoon fishes fast with an erratic, fluttering action that hungry fish can’t resist. category.description: When you want to attract big fish from afar, crank up the volume with VMC’s Rattle Spoon. category.description: VMC’s Tingler Spoon is ice fishing’s ultimate flutter spoon. category.description: Single or tandem, Dacron or steel, Williamson Assist Hooks increase your catch percentage from the moment you put them on your favorite jigs. Because the assist hooks hang freely and are lighter than the jig, they often get sucked into the fish’s mouth before it gets to the jig—hooking the fish before it even knows it. Be sure to rig these directly to the leader so fish can’t use the weight of the lure to throw the hook.

category.description: Get straight to catching big saltwater predators with Williamson’s Game Fish Kit. The six proven, all-around lures in the Game Fish Kit are professionally rigged and guaranteed to deliver big fun out in the big blue.

page-attributes.page-description: Get straight to catching big saltwater predators with Williamson’s Game Fish Kit. The six proven, all-around lures in the Game Fish Kit are professionally rigged and guaranteed to deliver big fun out in the big blue.

category.description: Williamson’s Heavy Speed Jig Kit features our best speed jigs, hand picked for depths of 50 to 100 meters or strong currents. These jigs will get you down to where the fish are, even in the heaviest drifts.

page-attributes.page-description: Williamson’s Heavy Speed Jig Kit features our best speed jigs, hand picked for depths of 50 to 100 meters or strong currents. These jigs will get you down to where the fish are, even in the heaviest drifts.

category.description: Specially designed for shallow water fishing, Williamson’s Light Speed Jig Kit is a collection of our best speed jigs. Great for fishing drop-offs and beds or slower currents, with a variety of sizes to match any conditions.

page-attributes.page-description: Specially designed for shallow water fishing, Williamson’s Light Speed Jig Kit is a collection of our best speed jigs. Great for fishing drop-offs and beds or slower currents, with a variety of sizes to match any conditions.
Master Kit

category.description: The name says it all. Williamson’s Tuna Catcher Kit will put tuna in the boat—no doubt about it. We’ve selected four of the best Tuna Catcher Rigged Baits, known for their productivity and effectiveness, to deliver hook ups trip after trip.

page-attributes.page-description: The name says it all. Williamson’s Tuna Catcher Kit will put tuna in the boat—no doubt about it. We’ve selected four of the best Tuna Catcher Rigged Baits, known for their productivity and effectiveness, to deliver hook ups trip after trip.

category.description: Gear up for your next offshore fishing trip with Williamson saltwater fishing tools and fillet knives. These tools are tough as the conditions, built to get the job done and stand up to the rigors of saltwater angling.

page-attributes.page-description: Gear up for your next offshore fishing trip with Williamson saltwater fishing tools and fillet knives. These tools are tough as the conditions, built to get the job done and stand up to the rigors of saltwater angling.

category.description: Some accessories just can’t be categorized, but they’re important nonetheless. The list below includes handy saltwater tools, intelligently designed to deliver a better day on the water. From making the rigs to fighting in the fish, Williamson’s accessories help guarantee saltwater success.

page-attributes.page-description: Some accessories just can’t be categorized, but they’re important nonetheless. The list below includes handy saltwater tools, intelligently designed to deliver a better day on the water. From making the rigs to fighting in the fish, Williamson’s accessories help guarantee saltwater success.

category.description: Having the right tools while fishing is key to an amazing day on the water. Pliers, cutters and shears just might be the most important tools on board. Whether you’re starting fresh or replacing worn out tools, don't leave home without these must-haves!

page-attributes.page-description: Having the right tools while fishing is key to an amazing day on the water. Pliers, cutters and shears just might be the most important tools on board. Whether you’re starting fresh or replacing worn out tools, don't leave home without these must-haves!

category.description: Williamson fillet knives are manufactured by the same company that makes the Classic Rapala® Fillet Knife. Marttiini combines years of artisan knife making and today's modern technologies with carefully chosen materials to create knives that exceed uncompromising standards. Known for their precision blades, every Marttiini knife is manually finished by the hands of skilled veterans to that legendary razor sharp edge.

category.description: Born on the rugged south coast of Africa, Williamson makes lures for those who thrive on the challenge of finding and conquering the world’s largest fish. Hard-won knowledge and a sincere passion for offshore angling assure that there’s a Williamson lure to fill every spot in any saltwater spread.
